rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls of the sewer tunnel gleam dully as they rise overhead to
meet the arch of the ceiling. A thick and smelly muck rises around your feet
splashing up to your calves as you walk, releasing you reluctantly with your
every step. The stench of decay and stagnation fills the air here.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The outside world  is up.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
This immense and dark drainage pipe is filled with enough mud that you are
up to your knees in it. The ceiling stretches far about your head and it is
amazing that a system of this size lurks beneath what is a relatively small
town. The tunnel walls are so very smooth that they seem to almost have been
melted out in one piece. The place smells of old muck and stagnant water.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
You see the muddy sewer continuing into the darkness to the south.

ExtraDescs.Description:
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer junction
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls of the nasty sewer continue in several directions, floor 
sloping slightly to the south. The mud clings to your legs as if it wishes to 
keep you in its grip for posterity, releasing you with each step reluctantly. 
The smells of stagnant water and of mildew are oppressive.

Exits.Description: The muddy sewer stretches into the dark to the north.
East.  The muddy sewer leads into a bend that goes south.
South.  The muddy sewer ends in a mudhole that way.

ExtraDescs.Description:
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

rooms.Name: A mud-filled depression
rooms.Description:
Faint and odd scratching noises echo in the high reaches of this dark place,
making you shiver uncomfortably. The mud is deeper here and you sink up to
your thighs, shuddering gratefully when your feet finally touch bottom. Just
barely discernable in the center of the room is an odd-looking drainage pipe.

Exits.Description: North.  The muddy junction lies in that direction.

ExtraDescs.Description:
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

rooms.Name: A dark pit
rooms.Description:
At the edge of a deep pit, you look down into darkness. The same seamless 
ceiling stretches overhead, occasional sounds echoing in its reaches. On the
floor, a thin covering of muck makes the footing a bit precarious. The air 
is moved by a small breeze which carries with an unidentifiable rank odor.

Exits.Description: East.  The sewer leads into the sewer junction.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
As you slog through this place, the mud clings to your legs as if it wishes
to keep you here. It takes some concerted effort to lift your feet with each
step. Though they are far away, the smooth walls of the sewer tunnel seem to
move closer, making you feel a bit trapped. The muck smells stagnant.

Exits.Description: East.  The mud stretches on into the darkness.

South.  There is even more mud in that direction than where you are now.  
Incredible.

ExtraDescs.Description:
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
Slogging through a soupy, drippy, muddy mess sure takes a lot of energy. It 
would be nice if there was a place to rest, but there isn't even a small ledge
here. The walls are still almost as smooth as glass. They gleam dully in the
small light available, unconsolingly. The reek of the muck makes you think
longingly of a nice, warm tub filled with soapy water.

Exits.Description: The muddy sewer pipe leads into a bend that goes east.

The pipe leads into a bend that goes south.  Interesting, there's mud on the
floor there.

ExtraDescs.Description:
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer bend
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls and ceiling of the sewer gleam dully in response to the 
flickers of the light which you are holding. Faint scratching and thumping
noises and the occasional splash echo out of the distant darkness, making
you a bit uneasy. The musty smell of the muck and water that reaches your
knees and seems to be trying to climb higher makes you cough uncomfortably.

Exits.Description:
The pipe leads into a intersection that goes south and east.  The floor here 
is still covered in mud.

The pipe (still filled with mud) leads into a intersection that goes north 
and south.  Interesting.

ExtraDescs.Description:
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

rooms.Name: A muddy intersection
rooms.Description:
The stagnant and smelly mud grabs your feet as if it wishes to keep you. The
unredeemed darkness deadens your spirits, leading you to silence rather than
encouraging laughter. The smooth walls offer no ledge or handhold by which
to pull yourself along and you find yourself wishing you had a stout staff on
which to lean. Far away, the sounds of scratching ring faintly.

Exits.Description:
North.  The pipe goes into a bend with a load of mud all the way up the walls.
The bend leads west.

East.  This way like a place for the annual mud festival, although the stench
wouldn't allow any happiness at all.  The pipe leads into a bend that leads 
north.

South.  There's less mud in that direction.  *smile*.  Your light doesn't 
cover enough space for you to see much more than that it leads into some
sort of junction.

ExtraDescs.Description:
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

rooms.Name: A sewer junction
rooms.Description:
In the smooth ceiling which is high above your head, there is something 
that looks to be an air shaft. It is small enough that, even if you could
reach it, you still couldn't force your way through. The mud is deep here
and you are happy each time your foot finds the solid rock bottom.

Exits.Description: North.  Mud is the floor basis in that direction.  Yummy.
YYEEUUCH!  BOOH!  THAT looks like a nice place for creepy crawlies.

North.  This direction looks quite nice actually.  The pipe leads into 
a bend that goes east.

A few yards ahead - away from this junction - there is a pit leading down,
but the smell from there...>PHEWW<.

ExtraDescs.Description:
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

rooms.Name: A bend in sewer pipe
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls of the sewer pipe curve and change direction, still without 
a seam. They gleam faintly in the small light available. The smelly sludge 
which coats the floor and walls to the level of your ankles makes you want to
shiver in disgust. Sounds echo faintly in the distance, breaking the silence.

Exits.Description: North.  You are staring into a huge junction with exits in all directions.
East.  The Pipe leads into utter darkness that way.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer pipe
rooms.Description:
At a dark intersection the pipe here arches higher in the center. The mud 
here rises up to your knees again, holding on to your legs. Faint noises echo 
in the high reaches, bouncing off the ceiling. The dark muck which holds on 
to you sends up a noxious odor each time you succeed in freeing your feet.

Exits.Description: East.  There's less mud in that direction, or that's your impression.

That way is lost in darkness, though you sense less mud in that direction,
perhaps even a complete end to this sludge that surrounds you.
West.  The mud reaches that way too, all the way up the walls.

ExtraDescs.Description:
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

rooms.Name: A bend in the muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
Faint noises echo in the dark reaches of the sewer, making you wonder what
may be lurking there. The noises come from no identifiable direction. It is
still quiet enough for the sounds of your breathing and of your feet freeing
themselves from the muck ring hollowly here. A tiny breeze stirs the air.

Exits.Description:
South.  There's even more mud that way, incredible!  Although it looks
like an intersection in the sewer system that leads east and south.

West.  All you can see, is that the pipe leads into a bend that goes
north.  But there's less mud in that direction, however odd that sounds.

ExtraDescs.Description:
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

rooms.Name: A muddy intersection
rooms.Description:
The clinging muck rises up to your hips. Luckily, there seems to be more 
water in it here. The slightly thinner mixture makes it a little easier to
walk. On the negative, splashes heard from not to far away makes one wonder
what could be swimming here. The scent of stagnant water causes you to wish 
that you had no sense of smell. It is unpleasant to say the least.

Exits.Description:
North.  Sludge and sediment fills this corridor of the sewer that leads
into a bend going west.

East.  You can see absolutely nothing of interest in that direction (Maybe
that's why it's so damn interesting.??) There's no mud in that direction
either, GREAT!

South.  All you can see is more mud!  Although the pipe goes into a bend
leading west.

ExtraDescs.Description:
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

It's NOT the kind of matter that would concern you too much, normally, but
as you are in the middle of it, it just might become your main concern.
REAL YUCKY!

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
The seamless walls of this drainage sewer gleam dully in the small light
provided by the source that you hold. A small breeze stirs the air, brushing
your nostrils with the acrid stench of the liquid muck through which you are
walking. The liquid is cold, but with little current, it is very stagnant.

Exits.Description:
North.  Filled with mud, that place looks like an impassable intersection
with pipes leading north and east.

West.  There's less mud that way, maybe you're on your way out of this foul
place.

ExtraDescs.Description:
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

rooms.Name: A strange raised opening
rooms.Description:
The deep muck here surrounds a raised area in the middle of the room. There
is a huge opening in the center of it and metal bars implanted in the side of
the hole lead down into the darkness. The walls here are smooth and seemless,
almost looking as if they have been polished. The odors defy description.

Exits.Description:
East.  You see, because of the utter darkness that surround you, absolutely
nothing.  Your light isn't of much use for that kind of distance.

ExtraDescs.Description:
These look like they're pretty slippery, and not very safe, but perhaps safe
enough for you to climb down, WITH both hands on them.

rooms.Name: A bend in the sewer tunnels
rooms.Description:
The sounds of splashing echo high in the reaches of the twisting tunnels. 
Gleaming dully in the light from the source which you carry, the walls look
as if they were melted more than cut from this stone. The thigh deep muck
reeks strongly of stagnation and chills you with its coldness.

Exits.Description:
East.  What a quiet place you've found there.  It's an intersection that has
pipeways going north and east.
South.  You see nothing at all in that direction it's too dark anyway.

rooms.Name: A junction in the sewer tunnels
rooms.Description:
A dark junction in the sewers does nothing to ease your mind. From all 
directions, faint rustles and splashings can be heard. Wading through the
chill and deep, stagnant muck, it is easy to lose heart. This is certain. It 
is a great mystery why this small town has such a huge sewer running beneath 
it. Another mystery is how the tunnels were melted from living stone.

Exits.Description: North.  You see a bend.

South.  It looks like a pipe junction just like this one.  Only that one
leads east and west.
West.  There's a junction with four pipelines in that direction.

rooms.Name: A junction in the sewers
rooms.Description:
The faint and musical trickle of water from a tiny opening far above attracts 
your attention and rings loudly in the relative silence of the sewers. The 
cold muck now clings to your knees as the level of the floor rises a bit. You
look for a place to rest, but aside from sitting in the nasty slop through
which you have been walking, there is no place to do so.

Exits.Description: To the north you can see a junction like this one, leading north and west.

To the east there's nothing of particular interest, though there's a 
junction with pipelines leading north and east.
The sewer continues.
There's a bend to the west leading north.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
A dark section of sewer is filled with a soupy, smelly muck which reaches
to your knees. The stench decay and stagnation fills the air. The smooth
walls rise high above your head and arch into the ceiling far above. The
muck is chilly enough to make you shiver in your boots.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls gleam dully as they rise up the meet the arched ceiling.
The mucky water splashes up around your thighs with each step, its coldness
chilling you and making you wish you were somewhere else. The smell of decay
and corruption fills the air, making you choke and cough.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A quiet pipe junction
rooms.Description:
The floor rises here out of the muck enough so that it is just barely damp. 
Finally, you have found a place where you can rest in relative comfort. A
bit of a breeze wafts the smells of stagnant water and muck past your nose,
reminding you that this is not a walk in the park.

Exits.Description: In that direction, you can't see anything.  It's just too dark.
There's an ordinary junction in the pipe system to the east

West.  There's an ordinary bend leading south into the sewer system in
that direction.

rooms.Name: An odd room
rooms.Description:
As you enter this room, you hear a loud clicking sound and a rumble as the
room shifts, knocking you from your feet. You feel the room begin to fall
around you, down and down, till it stops with an abrupt jerk. Another click
sounds and you see an arched doorway which leads down.

Exits.Description: Heh .. you are on the same level still.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls gleam dully in the small light from the source which you
hold as they rise up the meet the arched ceiling. The mucky water splashes 
up around your thighs with each step, its coldness chilling you and making 
you wish you were somewhere else. The smell of decay and corruption fills 
the air, making you choke and cough. Distantly, faint splashes can be heard.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A sewer
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls of the sewer reach high above here, dwarfing you. You slosh 
through a chilly, muddy soup which splashes around your ankles and up to your
calves. The strong smell of stagnation and decay prevails. The faint sounds of 
splashing and the scratching of claws on stone echo softly in the distance.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
To the east there's a peculiar looking round room.
To the south there's another intersection with pipes going south and east.

To the west there's another intersection like this one, with sewer pipes
leading south and west.

rooms.Name: An intersection in the sewers
rooms.Description:
The mucky slop that you are slogging through is so cold as to almost make
your feet and legs numb. Unfortunately, the cold does not decrease the smell
of the stagnant water. The smooth walls rise high about your head and gleam
softly in the small light, as if they had been polished by a loving hand.

Exits.Description:
To the north there's an intersection, where the pipes are leading west and
east.  You notice that the floor to the west is covered in mud.

East.  You see nothing of interest in that direction, just another 
intersection.  This one leads east and south.
Another intersection lies to the south.  It leads west and south.

rooms.Name: A junction in the sewers
rooms.Description:
Different from all the others, this intersection is dry and relatively clean. 
The smooth, seamless walls rise high above your head and arch into the curved
ceiling. Noises come from all directions, ringing hollowly in the empty space.
A breeze carries the scent of stagnant water and muck past your nose. Above a
small and slippery air shaft rises toward the sky, unclimbable.

Exits.Description: North.  You see an intersection there, leading north and east.
The sewer continues.
To the south there's ANOTHER junction leading west and east.

To the west you see a load of mud and sediment in the sewer.  That should
be an intersection there but you're not quite sure.

ExtraDescs.Description:
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
The seamless walls of this drainage sewer gleam dully in the small light
provided by the source that you hold. A small breeze stirs the air, brushing
your nostrils with the acrid stench of the liquid muck through which you are
walking. The liquid is cold, but with little current, it is very stagnant.
The sounds of the splashing of soft bodies into water sound around you.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A junction in the sewers
rooms.Description:
The water and muck here rises about your ankles, chilling them. The smell
of stagnant water fills the air, almost choking you. In contrast, the smooth
walls gleam like polished stones as they rise above you. Faint clicking and
scratching sounds can be heard in the distance as they echo in the sewers.

Exits.Description: To the east you can see a bend in the pipe going south.
To the west you can just make out an old well.

rooms.Name: A triple junction in the sewers
rooms.Description:
The walls rise far about your head into the immense arch of the ceiling. The 
polished walls of this place gleam dully in the reflected light. You slosh
through slop up to your ankles, wincing slightly at the oder that wafts up to
your nose. What passes for water here is cold enough to make your skin sting.

Exits.Description: East.  You can see a bend in the sewer pipe leading north.

To the south there's a ENORMOUS quadruple sewer junction, all lit up by
an odd light.

To the west you can just make out another junction similar to the one 
you are standing in.

rooms.Name: A quadruple junction in the sewers
rooms.Description:
The arched ceiling reaches high above this pace where four tunnels intersect,
one going in each cardinal direction. The exceedingly smooth walls gleam in
the little available light. Your feet stick in the sludge here, making it
hard to lift them, even though it is not so deep. The smell is unbearable.

Exits.Description:
To the north you can see a huge triple junction with sewer pipes leading
west and east.
East.  You can see a pit in the floor.
To the south there's a huge junction with pipes leading east and west.
To the west there's an odd looking room with totally smooth walls.

ExtraDescs.Description:
It looks as if it's made of stainless steel, and it would very well function
as a club of considerable power, but alas ...  You can't take at all since
it's firmly set into the concrete wall.

rooms.Name: A junction in the sewers
rooms.Description:
A dark intersection in the pipes gives you four choices in dirctions. A light
breeze blows through, carrying the scents of stagnant water and corruption. A
scratching sound echos in the high reaches of this place and seems to come 
from one direction and then another. It is rather unsettling.

Exits.Description:
To the north there's a ENORMOUS quadruple sewer junction, all lit up by
an odd light.
East.  You can just make out a triple junction leading north and east.
The sewer continues.
West.  You can just make out a triple junction leading north and west.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls gleam dully as they rise up the meet the arched ceiling.
The mucky water splashes up around your thighs with each step, its coldness
chilling you and making you wish you were somewhere else. The smell of decay
and corruption fills the air, making you choke and cough.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
The mucky slop that you are slogging through is so cold as to almost make
your feet and legs numb. Unfortunately, the cold does not decrease the smell
of the stagnant water. The smooth walls rise high about your head and gleam
softly in the small light, as if they had been polished by a loving hand.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A bend in the sewer pipe
rooms.Description:
Absolutley smooth walls surround and rise above you, gleaming dully in the 
little available light. They look almost as if they have been melted from
the living rock in one piece. A layer of sludge and water covers the floor
and splashes up as you walk, coating your boots and clothes.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
To the south you can see another bend leading west.
West.  You can just make out a triple junction leading north and west.

rooms.Name: A bend in the sewer pipe
rooms.Description:
These dark sewers do not look as if they were made by the hands of men. The 
smooth walls are seamless, melted from the living stone here. A foul odor 
fills this place, from the stagnant water and old sludge. The sound of the
trickling water sounds, as does the faint splashes of bodies moving through
the tunnels here. The scratching of claws upon stone makes you shiver.

Exits.Description: North.  You see another bend leading west.

You can see another junction although this one is a triple one with pipes
going south and west.

rooms.Name: A dark section of the sewer
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls of this section rise overhead into the curved ceiling. 
Echos of scratching and splashing noises ring and bounce off the stone 
here. The mucky water is up to your ankles still, making you wonder if 
you will ever have dry feet again. In the center of the room, the floor
rises slightly out of the muck, and a strange pit with iron bars set 
into its side goes down through its center.

Exits.Description: West.  You can see a dimly lit quadruple junction with an exit up.

rooms.Name: A round room
rooms.Description:
As you enter, the walls of this perfectly round room begin to rotate around 
you, first slowly and then faster and faster. You lose all sense of direction,
now unsure which way is up and which way is down. The spinning slows and when
it finally comes to a stop, you see that the only exit leads east.

Exits.Description: You can just make out a smaller room with a chair.

rooms.Name: A three way junction in the sewers
rooms.Description:
In a dark junction in the sewers, the smooth and dully gleaming walls rise 
high above your head. You splash through water and muck up to your knees, the
smell here making your eyes water. The floor rises slightly to the east and to
the south. There you see the entrances to two rooms.

Exits.Description: East.  You can make out a dimly lit Guard Room.
To the south you can see what looks like a store room.
West.  You see another junction similar to this one leading north and south.

rooms.Name: A small room in the sewers
rooms.Description:
In this small room, the walls rise above you, looking partially unfinished. 
The stone floor is dry and there is a coating of dust upon it which has been
disturbed by the passage of strange feet. A few sacks that are filled with
grain look as if they have been nibbled to death by mice. The remains of some 
broken wooden chairs have been tossed carelessly into the corner.

Exits.Description: To the north you see a pipe junction.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: An unused room
rooms.Description:
In this small room, the walls rise above you, looking partially unfinished. 
The stone floor is dry and there is a heavy coating of dust which doesn't 
look as if any feet have walked in it for many years. Various anonymous
lumps are on the floor, shrouded in the thick dust.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A dark room in the sewers
rooms.Description:
A dark shaft leads down into the deep gloom here. It's walls are smooth and
there is no natural handhold available, but iron spikes and bars have been
carefully hammered into the side to allow access. The sounds of splashing and
a faint muttering noise echo in the dark passages of the sewer. The nasty
smell of stagnant water and muck drifts past your nose, making you shudder.

Exits.Description: To the south you can see the pipe leading further south into darkness.

ExtraDescs.Description:
Firmly set into the wall of the shaft it's impossible to even rock, is your
estimate.

rooms.Name: A passage in the sewers
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls gleam dully as they rise up the meet the arched ceiling.
The mucky water splashes up around your thighs with each step, its coldness
chilling you and making you wish you were somewhere else. The smell of decay
and corruption fills the air, making you choke and cough.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A passage in the sewers
rooms.Description:
The smells of stagnant water and of rotting things grows a little fainter
here, as small breeze comes from an airshaft above. The smooth walls arch
high above your head and even if you could reach the airshaft it is too small
to consider passing through. The muck which is up to your knees clings to 
you as if it does not want to let you leave this place.

Exits.Description: To the north you can just make out a huge shaft leading down.
The sewer continues.
To the south you can see a triple junction leading west and east.

rooms.Name: A three way junction in the sewers
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls of the tunnel rise high above your head. They look as if
they have been melted from the living stone and it makes you wonder what
force could have caused them to be formed. The thigh-high muck clings to your
legs making movement difficult. The foul scent of stagnation fills the air.

Exits.Description: You see a sewer pipe leading north.

West.  You see another junction very similar to this one that leads north
and west.

rooms.Name: A room in the sewers
rooms.Description:
This dry-floored room is lit so brightly that it is almost blinding after the 
darkness of the sewer tunnels. A dozen wooden chairs are positioned about the 
room, against the walls. This would almost be a pleasant place, except for
the stench that wafts in from the sewers and the muck which has been tracked
in on the stone floor. It is quiet here, unnervingly so.

Exits.Description: You can see an even larger room than this one, filled with light.
To the west you can see the sewers.

rooms.Name: A large room in the sewers
rooms.Description:
Even more brightly lit, this room is large by anyone's standard. The walls are 
formed from a material which glitters like gold. On second glance, you realize
that there is no external light source here. The walls themselves are shining
with a strange inner light. The room looks better kept than the others you may
have seen, the floor only slightly mucky. A faint scent of decay wafts past.

Exits.Description: To the north you can see the guard room.
To the south there is nothing but water and an exit leads east from there.

rooms.Name: A murky pool in the sewer
rooms.Description:
The water in a dark pool rises up to your waist before you find solid footing.
Smooth walls rise above you, arching high over head into the ceiling. Even
though the water seems to be cleaner here, the scent of stagnation and decay
drifts past your nose. The water chills you to the very bone.

Exits.Description: To the north you see the entrance to this room.
You can see an enormous hall through the doorway.

rooms.Name: A section of the sewer
rooms.Description:
High above you, a grate-covered air shaft looks down, offering no hope of 
exit from this place. The seamless walls gleam dully in the faint light 
from your light source, rising far above your head to meet the arch of
the ceiling. Splashing through water up to your knees, you wish fervently
for a dry place to rest your weary bones, but there is none here.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A dark junction in the sewer
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls gleam dully as they rise high above you in this dark sewer
junction. The nasty muck and stagnant water rises about your knees, splashing
upwards as you walk. The scent of corruption and decay fills your nostrils,
making you want to retch. The sound of claws scrabbling on stone rings here.

Exits.Description:
Darkness has closed in on that part of the sewer system, you can't see
a thing in that direction.

West.  You see another junction very similar to this one that leads north
and west.

rooms.Name: A small room
rooms.Description:
A thin coat of sticky muck coats the floor of this small room, smelling
horribly. The walls here look as if they have been cut from the stone with
picks and chisels, rather than melted as the other areas were. In the precise
center of the room, a metal chair stands, bolted firmly to the floor.

Exits.Description: Utter darkness...!
You can see a room with a lot of light in it.  You can't make out any details.

rooms.Name: A mucky sewer pipe
rooms.Description:
A dark pipe is filled half-full of a foul smelling mucky water, stagnation 
and decay reign supreme here. The muck grasps and holds firmly at your legs
and feet, as if seeking to keep you here with it forever. The smooth walls
gleam dully as they rise above your head to meet the arch of the ceiling.

Exits.Description: To the south you can see a strange light flowing from there.

rooms.Name: An immense sewer pipe
rooms.Description:
An immense area of pipe stretches here, dwarfing everything. Gleaming dully, 
the smooth walls rise high above your head. Here some odd scratchings have
been made along the walls, about at waist level. Perhaps it was a misguided
attempt to decorate this foul place. The stench of decay is overwhelming.

Exits.Description: To the north you can see a doorway.
You can't see anything in that darkness.
In the south end of the pipe the "floor" is completely covered with water.

ExtraDescs.Description:
An odd pattern of scratches have been left here, looking as if they
have been made by animal claws. As you look more closely, the scratchings
squirm and morph into something understandable. They say: All must bow
and die before the Great WyrmGod.

rooms.Name: An immense sewer pipe
rooms.Description:
An immense and dark pipe stretches high over head, sounds of bodies splashing 
into water and the faint scratch of claws upon stone ringing in its heights.
The soupy muck you wade through is thigh-deep and cold enough that you begin
to lose feeling in your legs. Anyplace dry would be a welcome change now.

Exits.Description: You see a lot of pictures decorating the walls.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A room in the sewers
rooms.Description:
A thin coat of sticky muck coats the floor of this small room, smelling
horribly. The walls here look as if melted from the living stone. In the 
muck are embedded bones, skeletons of those less fortunate than you. On
the walls, rings have been mounted and there are rusty chains hanging 
from them. It is not a pleasant sight to see.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A sloping area of sewer
rooms.Description:
The floor here slopes down on one side, where it is covered with water and 
smelly muck. It is dark here and the smooth walls gleam dully in the small
slight provided by your light source. Occasionally, small sparks dance at 
the edge of your vision, but evade any attempt of yours to look at them.

Exits.Description:
You can hardly make out much more than that the next place is in a pipe 
with more water.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

rooms.Name: A dark and mucky hallway
rooms.Description:
Splashing through a stagnant smelling, soupy muck which reaches to your
waist, you shiver at the coldness and long for a place that is dry and 
warm and safe. The seamless walls reach high overhead and arch into the
ceiling where a small, grated airshaft looks down upon you, unaccessable.

Exits.Description: You can see nothing at all because it's completely dark in that direction.
You see a lot of light, bright as daylight, but nothing of interest.

rooms.Name: A dark and mucky passageway
rooms.Description:
In this dark passageway, you can see very little aside from your hand in
front of your face. You step carefully, not trusting the footing, not wanting
to slip in the slimy muck that thinly coats the floor. The walls feel smooth
beneath your hand and offer no firm handhold and no security.

Exits.Description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

rooms.Name: A dark and mucky passageway
rooms.Description:
Dark and disconcerting, the passageway offers insecure footing at best. You 
find yourself sliding in the smelly muck which coats the floor of this place
The smooth walls offer no security and there is no place to find a handhold.
The darkness is so complete that you can scarcely see your hand before you.

Exits.Description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

rooms.Name: A dark and mucky passageway
rooms.Description:
A slippery coating of muddy slime coats the floor here and you would almost 
rather die, than fall and find yourself covered in it. You think longingly
of a warm bath and of a hot dinner, anything to keep your mind off the nasty
stench which rises up to greet your nose. Reaching for the wall, you slip.

Exits.Description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

rooms.Name: A dark and mucky passageway
rooms.Description:
The darkness is so complete here that you can not even see the ground beneath
your feet. You feel your way carefully, not wanting to slip and fall into the
ankle deep muck which reeks terribly. The smooths walls which look as though
they have been polished by hand, offer little in they way of handholds.

Exits.Description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can just make out a triple junction leading north and west.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

rooms.Name: A mucky sewer bend
rooms.Description:
The mucky, reeking soup rises here to your hip-level. You reach carefully 
for the wall as you feel the slight tug of a current pulling south. The 
footing here is much less than secure. The very idea of getting any more of
this noxious glop on you than you absolutely must is most abhorrent.

Exits.Description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

rooms.Name: A mucky sewer
rooms.Description:
A faint current pulls south slightly, unsettling you and making your footing 
even more shaky than it was. Never has the idea of a nice inn with warm beds,
hot food and good company sounded better than it does right now. The soupy
muck that you are walking through splashes up about your waist.

Exits.Description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

rooms.Name: A mucky sewer
rooms.Description:
Dark and forbidding, this passage offers little in the way of firm footing. 
The smooth walls offer no handhold to reassure you, as a slight current tugs
you toward the south. In the lack of any bright light, you can not see your
hand in front of your face, let alone where to place your next step.

Exits.Description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

rooms.Name: A mucky sewer junction
rooms.Description:
The dark, mucky water splashes up to your waist as you wade through these 
dark tunnels, wishing you were somewhere else. The smooth walls glimmer a
bit in the small light, but not enough to actually allow you clear vision.
You slip slightly and then regain your balance with a feeling of relief.

Exits.Description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

rooms.Name: A mucky sewer
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls of the tunnel reach high above your head into the darkness.
Decay and stagnation reign here, tormenting your nose and making you sneeze.
A faint current tugs at you, flowing south. The footing here is tenuous, at
best and the walls offer little hope of any handhold.

Exits.Description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

rooms.Name: A mucky sewer junction
rooms.Description:
Splashing though dark and mucky water up to your waist, you feel a faint  
current that wants to pull you south. The stench of stagnation and decay
fills the air and makes you wish you were anyplace else. The footing is
insecure and you feel your feet slip frequently as you try to make your way.

Exits.Description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

rooms.Name: A mucky sewer
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls gleam dully in the little light here, rising high above 
your head in an arch which is lost in the darkness. A slight current tugs
at you, wanting to pull you south. Your feet slip, but you swiftly regain
your balance, very glad not to have immersed yourself in the nasty muck.

Exits.Description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

rooms.Name: A mucky sewer bend
rooms.Description:
Walking through thigh deep water that swirls about here disconcertingly as 
it seeps out through a grated exit, you find it extremely difficult to keep
your feet under you. The seamless walls arch high above into a ceiling that
is lost in the darkness. The faint sounds of scratching claws on stone can
be heard, as well as the splash of small bodies hitting the water's surface.

Exits.Description:
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
The sewer continues.

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

rooms.Name: A ledge by the dark pool
rooms.Description:
Sound echos wildly here, telling you that there is an immense drop near. 
There is a huge, dark pool near, barely within sight. Footing is difficult 
here, the water washing over the ledge and rushing down to the pool like a
fall, making the surface bubble wildly.

Exits.Description: You can't see a thing.  It's too dark.
You can't see a thing.  It's too dark.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

rooms.Name: A ledge by the dark pool
rooms.Description:
A huge and dark pool is visible here, water rushing over this ledge to drop 
into it, making the surface boil wildly. The sound of the water drowns out
any other noises here and it is almost impossible to even hear yourself think.
The footing is insecure here and the smooth walls offer little in the way of
handholds. Underneath you, there is a small fissure in the rock.

Exits.Description: You can't see a thing.  It's too dark.
You can't see a thing.  It's too dark.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

rooms.Name: A passage in the sewers
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls of the sewer tunnel gleam dully as they rise over your head. 
A thick and smelly muck rises around your feet, splashing up to your calves 
as you walk, releasing you reluctantly with your every step. The nasty stench 
of decay and stagnation fills the air here. You wish you were anywhere else.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A passageway in the sewers
rooms.Description:
In this immense and dark drainage pipe, you are up to your knees in a thick, 
smelly muck. The ceiling stretches far about your head and it is amazing that 
a system of this size lurks beneath what is a relatively small town. The dark
tunnel walls are so very smooth that they seem to almost have been melted out 
in one piece. The place smells of old muck and stagnant water.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls of the nasty sewer continue, floor sloping slightly to the 
south. The mud clings to your legs as if it wishes to keep you in its grip for 
posterity, releasing you with each step reluctantly. The smells of stagnant 
water and of mildew are oppressive.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer passage
rooms.Description:
Faint and odd scratching noises echo in the high reaches of this dark place,
making you shiver uncomfortably. The mud is deeper here and you sink up to
your thighs, shuddering gratefully when your feet finally touch bottom. The
smell here is terrible, not to be described.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy passageway
rooms.Description:
In any direction, you look only into darkness. The same seamless ceiling 
stretches overhead, occasional sounds echoing in its reaches. On the floor, 
a thick layer of muck makes the footing extremely precarious. The air is 
moved by a small breeze which carries with an unidentifiable rank odor.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy passageway
rooms.Description:
As you slog through this place, the mud clings to your legs as if it wishes
to keep you here. It takes some concerted effort to lift your feet with each
step. Faint scratching and splashing noises echo, not too far distant. Though 
they are far away, the smooth walls of the sewer tunnel seem to move closer, 
making you feel a bit trapped. The muck smells stagnant.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A sewer passage
rooms.Description:
Slogging through a soupy, drippy, muddy mess sure takes a lot of energy. It 
would be nice if there was a place to rest, but there isn't even a small ledge
here. The high walls are still almost as smooth as glass. The reek of the muck 
makes you think longingly of a nice, warm tub filled with soapy water.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer passage
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls and ceiling of the sewer gleam dully in response to the 
flickers of the light which you are holding. Faint scratching and thumping
noises and the occasional splash echo out of the distant darkness, making
you a bit uneasy. The musty smell of the muck and water that reaches your
knees and seems to be trying to climb higher makes you cough uncomfortably.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
The stagnant and smelly mud grabs your feet as if it wishes to hold and keep 
you. The unredeemed darkness deadens your spirits. The smooth walls offer no 
ledge or handhold by which to pull yourself along here and you find yourself 
wishing you had a stout staff on which to lean. Far away, the faint sounds of 
scratching and splashing ring omenously.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
In the smooth ceiling which is high above your head, there is something 
that looks to be an air shaft. It is small enough that, even if you could
reach it, you still couldn't force your way through. The mud is deep here
and you are happy each time your foot finds the solid rock bottom.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer passage
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls of the sewer pipe curve and change direction, still without 
a seam. They gleam faintly in the small light available. The smelly sludge 
which coats the floor and walls to the level of your ankles makes you want to
shiver in disgust. Sounds echo faintly in the distance, breaking the silence.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy passage
rooms.Description:
In a darker section of pipe, the floor here arches higher in the center. The 
mud here rises up to your knees again, holding on to your legs. Faint noises 
echo in the high reaches, bouncing off the ceiling. The dark muck which holds 
on to you sends up a noxious odor each time you succeed in freeing your feet.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer passage
rooms.Description:
Faint noises echo in the dark reaches of the sewer, making you wonder what
may be lurking there. The noises come from no identifiable direction. It is
still quiet enough for the sounds of your breathing and of your feet freeing
themselves from the muck ring hollowly here. A tiny breeze stirs the air.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
The clinging muck rises up to your hips. Luckily, there seems to be more 
water in it here. The slightly thinner mixture makes it a little easier to
walk. On the negative, splashes heard from not to far away makes one wonder
what could be swimming here. The scent of stagnant water causes you to wish 
that you had no sense of smell. It is unpleasant to say the least.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
The seamless walls of this drainage sewer gleam dully in the small light
provided by the source that you hold. A small breeze stirs the air, brushing
your nostrils with the acrid stench of the liquid muck through which you are
walking. The liquid is cold, but with little current, it is very stagnant.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A passageway in the sewer
rooms.Description:
A dark junction in the sewers does nothing to ease your mind. From all 
directions, faint rustles and splashings can be heard. Wading through the
chill and deep, stagnant muck, it is easy to lose heart. This is certain. It 
is a great mystery why this small town has such a huge sewer running beneath 
it. Another mystery is how the tunnels were melted from living stone.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
The sounds of splashing echo high in the reaches of the twisting tunnels. 
Gleaming dully in the light from the source which you carry, the walls look
as if they were melted more than cut from this stone. The thigh deep muck
reeks strongly of stagnation and chills you with its coldness.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A mucky sewer passageway
rooms.Description:
A dark passage in the sewers does nothing to ease your mind. From all round,
faint rustles and splashings can be heard. Wading through the chill and deep, 
stagnant muck, it is easy to lose heart. This is certain. A great mystery is
why this small town has such a huge sewer running beneath it. Another mystery 
is how the tunnels were melted from living stone.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
The faint and musical trickle of water from a tiny opening far above attracts 
your attention and rings loudly in the relative silence of the sewers. The 
cold muck now clings to your knees as the level of the floor rises a bit. You
look for a place to rest, but aside from sitting in the nasty slop through
which you have been walking, there is no place to do so.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: The edge of a dark pool
rooms.Description:
A huge cavern is here, its seamless walls rising high above your head. You
are ankle deep in the dark water of a pool. The coldness of the water makes
your feet numb, but, surprisingly, the smell here is better. There is a 
pronounced breeze which comes from a vent above.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The pool continues
The sewer continues.
The pool continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy passageway
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls gleam dully as they rise up the meet the arched ceiling.
The mucky water splashes up around your thighs with each step, its coldness
chilling you and making you wish you were somewhere else. The smell of decay
and corruption fills the air, making you choke and cough.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A sewer passage
rooms.Description:
The floor rises here out of the muck enough so that it is just barely damp. 
Finally, you have found a place where you can rest in relative comfort. A
bit of a breeze wafts the smells of stagnant water and muck past your nose,
reminding you that this is not a walk in the park.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A sewer tunnel
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls gleam dully in the small light from the source which you
hold as they rise up the meet the arched ceiling. The mucky water splashes 
up around your thighs with each step, its coldness chilling you and making 
you wish you were somewhere else. The smell of decay and corruption fills 
the air, making you choke and cough. Distantly, faint splashes can be heard.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A muddy sewer
rooms.Description:
The smooth walls of the sewer reach high above here, dwarfing you. You slosh 
through a chilly, muddy soup which splashes around your ankles and up to your
calves. The strong smell of stagnation and decay prevails. The faint sounds of 
splashing and the scratching of claws on stone echo softly in the distance.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.
The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A sewer passageway
rooms.Description:
The mucky slop that you are slogging through is so cold as to almost make
your feet and legs numb. Unfortunately, the cold does not decrease the smell
of the stagnant water. The smooth walls rise high about your head and gleam
softly in the small light, as if they had been polished by a loving hand.

Exits.Description: The sewer continues.

rooms.Name: A dark pool
rooms.Description:
The seamless walls of the huge cavern rise high above your head. You are 
waist deep in the dark water of a pool. The coldness of the water makes you 
numb. It makes you want to leave this place as quickly as possible. There is 
a pronounced breeze which comes from a vent above.

Exits.Description: The pool continues
The pool continues.
The pool continues

rooms.Name: A dark pool
rooms.Description:
A pronounced breeze comes from the vent in the high cavern ceiling, pressing
down with enough force to push you into the water here. The icy water trickles
in through a small opening to the north. Aside from the ripples caused by
your motions, the pool is very still, its surface like glass.

Exits.Description: The pool continues.
The pool continues.
The pool continues.

rooms.Name: A dark pool
rooms.Description:
In this dark cavern, the smooth walls gleam dully in the light from the
source which you carry. It dances acrossed the surface of the water adding
to the impression of its blackness. The water here is so cold as to numb
you. You think longingly of a large tub filled with hot water.

Exits.Description: The pool continues.
The pool continues.
The pool continues.

rooms.Name: A fissure under the ledge
rooms.Description:
A small fissure in the rock is slippery with the water trickling down from 
above. Below lies the edge of a great, dark pool. Rising from the surface is
the scent of stagnation and decay that has pervaded this place. Right now
even being at the refuse dump would be preferable to this.
